description: Phosphorylation of protein plays a key role in the regulation of many biological processes.  Herein, a simple approach is developed by immobilization of Ce(IV)-substituted polyoxometalate on ethylenediamine-functionalized graphene oxide (CeEGO) as adsorbent for selective isolation of intact phosphoproteins from real samples, such as MCF-7 cell lysate.
title: Immobilization of Ce(IV)-substituted polyoxometalate on ethylenediamine-functionalized graphene oxide for the isolation of intact phosphoproteins
